entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. entry.title: iamAbishekRavi/Expense-Tracker-using-Gpay-transcation-history: A lightweight personal expense tracker that parses GPay UPI transactions (Paid/Sent) and visualizes spending with filters, tables, and charts. Built with React, Recharts, and TailwindCSS ‚Äî no AI, no backend. Just clean, fast, and simple expense tracking!
entry.content: A lightweight personal expense tracker that parses GPay UPI transactions (Paid/Sent) and visualizes spending with filters, tables, and charts. Built with React, Recharts, and TailwindCSS ‚Äî no AI, no backend. Just clean, fast, and simple expense tracking!
